name: Sharemyvision
body:
### Welcome to SMV project.
Instragram like server component project.  It has a web component written in Jruby.
It has several separatedly deployable server components: user provision, mobile API, file upload/download, image processing service, email service, etc.
The whole thing is an SOA.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Web component
Using Rails and Jruby to display users' uploaded images

### File Service
A wrapper over S3 to serve file upload/download and generating encrypted, short-time-to-live urls

### Image processing
Generate thumbnails and other sizes for an image

### Email Service
Use to email out different emails with different templates

###Mobile API
Written in Jruby with an aggregator component to split out a request into several internal requests and merge the results before returning to the mobile clients
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
